General.Name: Eldav-L
General.Description: Eldav Investments Ltd. is a private equity firm specializing in buyout, mature, and acquisition of mid to large sized companies. It seeks to invest in industrial, service, finance and commercial companies. The firm invests internationally. It prefers to take majority stake in companies. Eldav Investments Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is based in Tel-Aviv, Israel.
General.Address: 48 Ahad Ha'am Street, Tel Aviv, Israel, 65202
